# Lesson 4

## Job Finding Rate

Probability of find a job
\[
f = \frac{H(U, V)}{U}
\]
\[
f = \gamma \sqrt{\theta}
\]

## Vacancy Filling Rate

Probability of filling a vacancy
\[
q = \frac{H(U, V)}{V}
\]
\[
q = \gamma (\theta)^{-1/2}
\]
